mainBoard.name: High Sentinels of Arashin

rulings.text: High Sentinels of Arashin gets +1/+1 per creature, not per +1/+1 counter. It doesn't matter how many +1/+1 counters are on any other creature you control as long as there's one or more.
The activated ability can target and put +1/+1 counters on High Sentinels of Arashin itself.

mainBoard.name: Siege Striker
mainBoard.originalText:
Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
Whenever Siege Striker attacks, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. Siege Striker gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature tapped this way.

rulings.text: If Siege Striker gains vigilance and attacks or attacks and becomes untapped before its last ability resolves, it can be tapped for its own ability.
If an attacking creature with vigilance is tapped for Siege Striker's ability, that creature remains an attacking creature.
Once Siege Striker's ability has resolved, it keeps the power-and-toughness bonus even if some of the tapped creatures leave the battlefield or become untapped.

You choose how many and which creatures to tap while Siege Striker's ability is resolving. No player may take other actions between the time you make this choice and the time Siege Striker's power and toughness are raised.

rulings.text: At the time the creature is exiled, Auras attached to it will be put into their owners’ graveyards. Any Equipment will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on it at that time will cease to exist.
If a creature token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won’t return to the battlefield.
If a double-faced card is exiled this way, it’ll return with its front face up. It gets a +1/+1 counter even if it isn’t a creature.
If a melded permanent is exiled this way, the two cards will both return with their front faces up. Each gets a +1/+1 counter.
If that creature is exiled during an end step, it won’t come back until the next turn’s end step.

mainBoard.text: Exile target creature. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

—Adrasteia, capitana akroniense
foreignData.name: Respuesta rauda
foreignData.text: Destruye la criatura objetivo girada.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Rien ne me satisfait autant que de mettre un bon coup de pied dans la tête de quelqu'un. »
—Adrastéïa, capitaine akroen
foreignData.name: Réponse expéditive
foreignData.text: Détruisez la créature engagée ciblée.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Non c'è niente di più appagante che stampare un bel calcio in faccia a qualcuno."
—Adrasteia, capitana di Akros
foreignData.name: Reazione Repentina
foreignData.text: Distruggi una creatura TAPpata bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText:
「顔に渾身の蹴りを入れるほど痛快なことはないな。」
――アクロスの隊長、アドラステア
foreignData.name: 素早い反応
foreignData.text: タップ状態のクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。

foreignData.flavorText:
"얼굴에 정확하게 발길질을 하는 것만큼 만족스러운 일은 거의 없다고."
—아크로스 대장, 아드라스티아
foreignData.name: 재빠른 반응
foreignData.text: 탭된 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Não há nada que dê a mesma satisfação que acertar um bom chute na cara."
— Adrasteia, capitã acrosana
foreignData.name: Resposta Rápida
foreignData.text: Destrua a criatura alvo virada.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Нет ничего приятнее, чем хорошенько врезать ногой кому-нибудь по роже».
— Адрастея, акросский капитан
foreignData.name: Стремительный Ответ
foreignData.text: Уничтожьте целевое повернутое существо.

foreignData.flavorText:
「没有什么事情比往敌人脸上狠狠踹一脚更解气的了。」
～阿喀洛斯队长阿卓斯蒂娅
foreignData.name: 快速反应
foreignData.text: 消灭目标已横置的生物。

foreignData.flavorText:
「沒有什麼事情比往敵人臉上狠狠踹一腳更解氣的了。」
～阿喀洛斯隊長阿卓斯蒂婭
foreignData.name: 快速反應
foreignData.text: 消滅目標已橫置的生物。

mainBoard.name: Swift Response

mainBoard.flavorText: The best techniques outlive their creators.
mainBoard.name: Duelist's Heritage

rulings.text: The ability of Duelist's Heritage triggers whenever any player attacks with one or more creatures, not just when you do. You know which players and planeswalkers the creatures are attacking before you choose the target creature.

mainBoard.text: Whenever one or more creatures attack, you may have target attacking creature gain double strike until end of turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: Wildflowers here bloom not with the season but with the ebb and flow of magic.
mainBoard.name: Thriving Heath
mainBoard.text:
Thriving Heath enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than white.
{T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.
